summary: THERE WERE PROBLEMS WITH THE IGNITION COIL PACK.  THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THERE IS A BACK ORDER ON THE PART.  *NLM  THE ENGINE MALFUNCTION LIGHT HAD COME ON AND THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO SHAKE.  THE VEHICLE HAD TO GO BACK TO THE DEALER FOR A SECOND TIME FOR THE ORIGINAL PROBLEM.  SCC
